alert.note: Alert for Adams; Allen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 9:08PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Allen, northern Adams, southwestern Paulding and western Van Wert Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 908 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monroeville, or 7 miles southeast of New Haven, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph along with heavy downpours. Road ponding and localized nuisance flooding is possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Monroeville around 915 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Convoy and Van Wert. This includes Interstate 469 between mile markers 13 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
